name: Super Nova Lancer: Privateer
description:
The Galaxy is filled with enemy aces and dangers that lurk beyond the stars.  Battle friend and foe alike as a Lancer, this sector's premier hostility resolution service.

Take on missions for competing factions while unraveling a sinister plot that threatens more than just Lancer Corp.

Super Nova Lancer: Privateer is a top down action shooter that will test your reaction time in space and on terra firma.  Upgrade your mech, launch your craft, and get ready to blast your foes into space dust.

Welcome to Lancer Corporation, the galaxy's first and foremost hostility resolution service.  As a Lancer, you will be expected to take on a variety of missions for our clients.  There is no such thing as a conflict of interest.

We expect great things from you, Lancer.

A single-player campaign spanning roughly an hour of playtime.

6 playable crafts (3 starships, 3 mechs)

8 enemy core craft types (24 total with variations)

3 boss crafts

Fully destructible debris in space and on planets

This project was made in Unity and runs on a 64-bit Windows PC.
